amendment.description: Amendment requires States to submit a copy of their hydraulic fracturing regulations and chemical disclosure requirements to the BLM for public disclosure and to provide other technical/clarifying changes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 113-271 to require states to submit a copy of their hydraulic fracturing regulations and chemical disclosure requirements to the BLM for public disclosure and provide other technical/clarifying changes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flores amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
